synopsis.text:
An unlucky streak in love plagues Rentarou Aijou, who faces rejection from a staggering hundred girls during his middle school years. In a desperate plea for divine intervention, he visits a shrine, hoping to turn his romantic fortunes around. His prayers are answered when a deity promises him a rendezvous with not one, but a hundred soulmates. However, this divine blessing comes with a sinister twist: if Rentarou fails to reciprocate a soulmate's feelings, she will meet an untimely demise.

As he embarks on his high school journey, he is taken aback when two girls, Hakari Hanazono and Karane Inda, confess their love for him on the very first day. Overwhelmed by this sudden development, Rentarou grapples with the challenge of managing multiple relationships to prevent any harm from befalling his potential partners. Will he successfully navigate this complex web of love, or will he be burdened with the guilt of unintended consequences? Join Rentarou in this thrilling and dark romantic comedy as he attempts to balance his feelings and protect his soulmates.
